dialogue.text: Welcome to this world, my child.
You are a wyrm. I am your mother. Obey me, and you will thrive. If you disobey.[pause=2] .[pause=2] . you shall perish.
If you wish to sleep, come to me. You may use the mouth of the Grand Queen as a Storehouse. She won't mind, since she is dead.
Oh yes, one last thing before you go into the world. . you will travel with another wyrm. You will soon discover the reason for this.
